Access Control Service & Maintenance

Keep your systems running with professional service contracts and emergency support

Protect Your Investment with Professional Service

Access control systems are critical to your facility's security and operations. Regular maintenance keeps systems running reliably, while emergency service ensures problems are resolved quickly. We offer comprehensive service contracts tailored to your facility's needs.

Request Service Quote Schedule Maintenance

Service Offerings

Preventive Maintenance Contracts

Scheduled service to prevent problems before they occur

  • Quarterly system health checks
  • Software updates and security patches
  • Hardware cleaning and calibration
  • User database maintenance and cleanup
  • Annual performance reports

Emergency Repair Service

Fast response when systems fail

  • Same-day response for critical failures
  • 24/7 emergency contact for urgent issues
  • Replacement parts inventory for common failures
  • Temporary solutions while permanent repairs are completed

System Upgrades & Expansions

Grow your system as your needs change

  • Add new doors and access points
  • Upgrade software for new features
  • Integrate with other building systems
  • Migrate to new technologies

User Training & Support

Help your staff get the most from your system

  • Administrator training on user management
  • Basic troubleshooting for common issues
  • Documentation and procedure development
  • Ongoing support as staff changes

Service Contracts

Basic Service

Perfect for smaller systems

  • Annual maintenance visit
  • Emergency repair support (standard rates)
  • Phone/email technical support
  • Software update notifications

Comprehensive Service

Recommended for critical systems

  • Quarterly maintenance visits
  • Priority emergency response
  • Discounted parts and labor
  • Proactive system monitoring
  • Annual system optimization

Custom Service Plans

Tailored to your specific needs

  • Service frequency based on usage
  • Coverage for multiple locations
  • Integration with facility management
  • Specialized training and documentation

Why Choose Our Service

We Installed It - We Know It

Our technicians are familiar with your specific system configuration and history.

Local Response

Based in Hollister with service throughout Central California.

Manufacturer Relationships

Direct access to vendor technical support and warranty services.

Complete Documentation

Detailed service records and system documentation for every visit.
